text: The Veljul Negreștilor is a left tributary of the river Velju Mare in Romania. It flows into the Velju Mare near Mădăras. Near Homorog much of its flow is diverted by the Criș Collector Canal towards the Crișul Negru near Tămașda.Planul de management al riscului la inundații - Administrația Bazinală de Apă Crișuri, p. 16, 33 ==References== Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Bihor County
title: Veljul Negreștilor
